author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a case of attention diversion, a gang of three members, who claimed themselves to be police personnel, robbed a five sovereign gold chain from a 59-year-old anganwadi worker, R. Rajathi, of Keezha Panangadi at Narimedu on Saturday.

Rajathi was on her way to the anganwadi through Thomas Street in Narimedu when she was intercepted by the three persons.

Introducing themselves as policemen, they claimed that there was some unrest in nearby areas and warned her against wearing jewellery.

When the woman tried to remove her gold chain and keep it in a purse, one of them advised her against it. Instead he offered to help her in wrapping the gold chain in a piece of paper and handed it over to her.

After walking for some distance, the woman realised that she was duped when she found the gold missing from the paper.

Tallakulam police are investigating.
title: Woman loses gold chain
